title: Brett and friends stick to a job: Brett and Greg
brief_description: This tape contains two programs entitled “Brett and Friends - Why stick to a job?” and “Brett and Greg - what are the options?” Brett and friends sets the context for Brett and Greg and should be viewed first. The two programs represent the viewpoints of Brett and Greg and their friends, some of whom had been unemployed for several months at the time of taping
